about.description:
At Austin Springs, you will experience both the charm of our community which spans across 15 acres with stunning lake views to go along with the energy and entertainment of Austin Landing, a mixed-use development with over 1 million square feet of highly desirable restaurants and shopping. With just a one-minute walk from the property to Austin Landing you can be at Kroger or other highly desirable restaurants such as Firebirds Wood Fired Grill, BJs Brewhouse, Chipotle, Starbucks, Deweys Pizza, Another Broken Egg, or Buffalo Wild Wings. Austin Landing events center has several exciting events during all seasons of the year including festivals and concerts and is known throughout the area for its Christmas decorations.

In addition to Austin Springs offering huge 1-, 2-, and 3-bedroom apartments with modern finishes, garages, fenced in yards for your pets, and screened in porches, Austin Springs provides an irreplaceable location that is a one-minute walk to Austin Landing, less than 5-minutes to I-75 and I-675, 15 minutes to downtown Dayton, and only 40 minutes to downtown Cincinnati.

about.description:
Welcome to Relay 129 Apartments and Townhomes, the newest luxury apartment community in Liberty Township, Ohio. These brand-new construction homes offer the perfect blend of upscale design, thoughtful features, and a prime location near West Chester, Mason, and top Northern Cincinnati destinations. Located within the highly rated Lakota East School District and just minutes from I-75, Liberty Center, The Christ Hospital Medical Center, and Costco, Relay 129 gives you unmatched access to everything you needright where you want to be.

Choose from spacious 1-, 2-, and 3-bedroom apartments or 3-bedroom townhomes with attached garages. Youll find modern finishes throughout every home, including two-tone custom cabinetry, quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, chrome accents, and stylish woodgrain flooring. Oversized closets, spa-inspired bathrooms with LED mirrors and marble tile, and full laundry rooms with washers and dryers provide the everyday comfort renters are looking for. Apartments are available in both elevator-accessible mid-rise buildings and walk-up buildings to suit your lifestyle.

Relay 129 also offers multiple parking options, including in-building parking garages, detached garages, and attached garages for all townhomesgiving residents flexibility and convenience.

Outside your door, resort-style amenities make it easy to relax, connect, and stay active. Spend your days at the sparkling pool and expansive sundeck, catch up with neighbors at the rooftop terrace or fire pit, or enjoy the two-story clubhouse complete with lounge seating and self-pour beverage taps. Stay on top of your fitness goals in the state-of-the-art gym featuring an outdoor turf space. Plus, Relay 129 is a pet-friendly community with green space and walkable surroundings.

Whether youre relocating to Liberty Township or simply looking to upgrade your lifestyle near Cincinnati, Relay 129 is the perfect place to call home.

Pre-leasing in Liberty Township soonjoin our VIP list and discover what elevated living truly means. Relay 129 Apartments & Townhomes is an apartment community located in Butler County and the 45044 ZIP Code. This area is served by the Lakota Local attendance zone. Unique Features

about.description:
Discover Comfort and Convenience at The Pines Apartments & Townhomes

Welcome to The Pines Apartments and Townhomes, a serene and well-maintained community nestled in the heart of Sharonville, OH. Ideally located just minutes from major highways, shopping centers, and dining options, The Pines offers a peaceful retreat with easy access to the best of Cincinnati.

Spacious Floor Plans to Suit Every Lifestyle

Choose from a variety of thoughtfully designed floor plans, including 1-, 2-, and 3-bedroom apartments and townhomes, ranging from 525 to 1,590 square feet. Each home is equipped with modern amenities to ensure comfort and convenience.

Community Amenities for a Balanced Lifestyle

At The Pines, we believe in providing a lifestyle that balances relaxation and activity. Enjoy our resort-style swimming pool, stay fit in the fully-equipped fitness center, or unwind in the clubhouse. Our pet-friendly community also features a designated pet play area, making it easy to enjoy time with your furry friends.

Modern Apartment Features

Each residence is designed with your comfort in mind, featuring:

Fully equipped kitchens with modern appliances

Spacious closets and private patios or balconies

Air conditioning and ceiling fans for year-round comfort

Washer and dryer hookups in select units

High-speed internet access available

Pet-Friendly Living

We understand that pets are family, which is why we welcome them with open arms. A one-time pet fee of $150 covers up to two pets, with a monthly pet rent of $25 per pet. Breed restrictions apply, so please contact our office for more information.

Exceptional Customer Service

Our on-site management and maintenance teams are dedicated to providing prompt and professional service, ensuring that your living experience is as comfortable as possible.

Schedule a Tour Today!

Experience the charm and convenience of The Pines Apartments and Townhomes. Contact us today to schedule a tour and find your perfect home in Sharonville. about.description: Contemporary Elegance in the Perfect Setting: Welcome to the new standard for contemporary luxury in Cincinnati's northeast corridor. The all-new River Ridge literally rises above the rest with the open floor plans and modern amenities you seek, in a spectacular setting overlooking the Little Miami Scenic River. Whether you desire proximity to hundreds of shopping, dining and entertainment options, or a direct route to downtown Cincinnati and Northern Kentucky, we are conveniently situated minutes from I-275 and I-71. The spacious one, two and three-bedroom apartments at River Ridge combine elegance with ease: stainless steel appliances and high ceilings, walk-in closets and washer-dryer connections, available garages and experienced on-site management and maintenance personnel. With two entrances to Lovelands famous bike trail close by, and your own personal balcony to put your feet up and gaze out over the river, River Ridge is a great place to call home.
